quote: Try as hard as we may for perfection  the net result of our labors is an amazing variety of imperfectness. We are surprised at our own versatility in being able to fail in so many different ways.
quote_letters: TRY AS HARD AS WE MAY FOR PERFECTION THE NET RESULT OF OUR LABORS IS AN AMAZING VARIETY OF IMPERFECTNESS WE ARE SURPRISED AT OUR OWN VERSATILITY IN BEING ABLE TO FAIL IN SO MANY DIFFERENT WAYS
